empty.title: Activate Card
empty.description: You have no new cards to activate

selection.title: Select a Card
selection.description: Activating a new card will automatically deactivate your old one.

activate.title: Expiration  Date
activate.ariaDescription: Please enter the expiration date for your card ending in

disclaimer.new: You cannot use your card for debit purchases that require a PIN until you set a PIN. If you do not or cannot set your PIN here, call 1-877-383-4802 to receive a PIN in the mail.
disclaimer.replacement: Activating your new card will automatically deactivate your old one. Your current PIN is the same, but you should update the expiration date and CVV where your card information is stored.

activate.error: Looks like you entered an invalid date.

ask.title: Do You Want To Keep Your Existing PIN?

description.benefits: can help keep your card safe.

disclaimer.digital: You cannot use your card for debit purchases that require a PIN until you set a PIN. If you do not or cannot set your PIN here, call 1-877-383-4802 to receive a PIN in the mail.
disclaimer.retail: Remember, you'll need to know this PIN to make purchases and use ATMs.

errors.invalid: The information you entered is invalid.
errors.match: Your PIN entries don't match. Try again.

ready.title: Success!
ready.description: Your card is now active and ready to be used.

disclaimer.retail: Activating this debit card automatically deactivated your old one, so make sure to update the expiration date and CVV where your card information is stored.

empty.title: Lock Card
empty.description: You have no cards that can be locked

selection.title: Lock Card
selection.description: Select one of your cards  to lock.

lockScreen.title: Lock Your Card
lockScreen.description: No new debit transactions can be made with this card once it is locked. You can turn it back on at any time.

lastTransaction.lastActivity: The last debit card activity on this account was
lastTransaction.cardTime: ago with your card ending in ...
lastTransaction.none: There are no transactions on this card.

info.title: About Card Lock
info.summary: When you lock your card, it will instantly prevent anyone from making new purchases with this card.
info.declined: All of these charges will be declined: In-store, Online, In-app and Phone purchases.
info.activity: Some activity may continue, including returns, credits, dispute adjustments, payments, some recurring debit transactions, protection product fees, other account fees, interest and certain other exempted transactions.
info.lost: If your card is lost or stolen or otherwise used without your authorization, give us a call right away at 1-888-464-0727.

selection.title: Unlock Card
selection.description: Select one of your cards  to unlock.

unlockScreen.title: Unlock Card
unlockScreen.description: Start allowing activity using this card.
unlockScreen.validate: Please enter the expiration date to confirm unlock
unlockScreen.error: The information you entered is invalid.
unlockScreen.lockedSince: Your card has been locked since

empty.title: No Contacts
empty.contactPoints: We need to verify your identity before you can order a new card. Give us a call at 1-888-464-0727.

sendcode.title: Send Code
sendcode.description: Before proceeding, we need to verify your identity with a temporary code. Select where this code should be sent.

smallText.situation: By choosing SMS, you are giving us permission to send you a text message. If you do not have access to the email address or SMS  above, give us a call at

entercode.title: Enter Code
entercode.description: A temporary verification code has been sent to
entercode.checkspam: If you didn’t receive it, check  your spam folder.
entercode.validity: This code will be valid for 15 minutes.

errors.invalid: Invalid code. Double check to see if you have entered the code correctly.

ineligible.message: We need to verify your identity before you can order a new card, but we don't have your email address or phone number. Give us a call at 1-888-464-0727.

empty.title: Set a New PIN
empty.description: You have no cards eligible to change PIN
empty.contactPoints: This card isn’t eligible to change PIN online. Give us a call at 1-888-464-0727 so we can help sort it out.

selection.title: Set a New PIN
selection.description: Select one of your cards to set a new PIN on.

pin.title: Set a New PIN
pin.description: Your verification code was approved. Enter your new PIN below.
pin.learnMore: Learn how to strengthen your PIN.

errors.invalid: The information you entered is invalid.

ready.title: Success!
ready.description: Your PIN number has been updated!
ready.smallText: This change takes place immediately and will work at any ATM.

order.expeditedCost: $25 will be immediately deducted from your checking account

type.title: What Happened To Your Card?
type.description: Do you still have the debit card ending in
type.question: in your possession?

request.title: Get a New Card
request.description: What's the reason for requesting a new debit card?

reasons.text: My card is bent or damaged.
The debit card's chip is not working.
My debit card number is illegible.

description.closeCard: Your current card will continue to work until you activate your new card
description.arrival: Your new card should arrive in

transactions.title: Have You Looked at Your Transactions?
transactions.description: Before you report your card missing, make sure you recognize your previous transactions.

steps.noIssues: If there are no issues, click

unsure.nextToTransaction: next to a transaction you don’t recognize

description.closeCard: We'll close your current card but you'll still have complete access to your account
description.newNumber: You'll receive a new card with a new card number

ship.title: Get a New Card
ship.addressPrompt: Do you want a new card sent to the address on file?

options.same: Send it to the address on file
options.different: Send it to a different address

ship.otherAddress: We'll need to talk with you to verify your identity before we can mail your new card.

reissue.description: You’re done! Your new debit card should arrive in

reorder.description: You’re done! You've reported your card missing and will receive a new one in

insufficient.title: Insufficient Funds
insufficient.description: There's not enough funds in your account for Expedited Delivery. You may continue with

otherLocation.title: Give Us A Call
otherLocation.description: All that's left to do is give us a call now at
otherLocation.verification: to verify your identity and new address. We'll work together to have your new card sent to you.

cancelOrder.title: Are You Sure?
cancelOrder.description: If you continue, we'll report your card lost or damaged and send you a new one.

inProgress.title: We're On It
inProgress.description: There is already a card on the way for you. Please call
inProgress.needCard: if you still need a new card.

confirmAction.title: Are You Sure?
confirmAction.description: It appears you have received a card that hasn't been activated.  Reporting it missing will cancel that card and you'll receive a new card with a new number.  If you report it damaged, you will receive a new card with the same number.
confirmAction.prompt: Are you sure you want to continue?

noCard.title: Something's Not Right
noCard.description: It looks like something is going on with your card, so give us a call now at
noCard.verification: We'll work together to have your new card sent to you.
